Parser

Class Parser.Reference

  • java.lang.Object
    • Parser.Parser.Reference

    Parser

    private class Parser.Reference
extends java.lang.Object
    These split methods needs some shared variables, and are placed in a inner class for this purpose.
    Author:
    Jan-Willem Gmelig Meyling

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • getReference

        private java.lang.Object getReference()
        Fetch a reference. A reference can be in several formats:
        • A reference to a single cell, matches one or more letters followed by one or more digits ("A3")
        • A reference to one or more columns, matches one or more letters, followed by a colon and the same pattern ("A:B")
        • A reference to a row, matches one or more digits, followed by a colon and the same character pattern ("1:3")
        • A reference to a range of cells, matches two single cell representations described above, separated by a colon. ("A1:B3")
        Returns:
        Object of type Cell, Column, Row or Range, or null if the character sequence did not match a reference.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When the input of the reference is malformed.

      • getCell

        private Cell getCell()
        Method to peek for a Cell at current index. A cell is expected to be in the format "A1"
        Returns:
        Cell in the current Sheet, or null if no Cell was found either in the input String or the Sheet.

      • getColIndex

        private int getColIndex()
        Method to peek for a String representation of an column index. Column indexes are expected to be in the format A, B, C... When a column is found, the current index is incremented.
        Returns:
        The index of the column, starting at 0 for A, or -1 when no column index was found.

      • getRowIndex

        private int getRowIndex()
        Method to peek for an row index. Row indexes are expected to be in the format 1, 2, 3...
        Returns:
        The index of the row, starting at 0 for 1, or -1 when no row index was found.
